item.title: An Inquiry Into Matplotlib's Figures
item.description: This guide dives deep into the inner workings of Matplotlib's Figures, Axes, subplots and the very amazing GridSpec!

item.title: Custom 3D engine in Matplotlib
item.description: 3D rendering is really easy once you've understood a few concepts. To demonstrate that, we'll design a simple custom 3D engine that with 60 lines of Python and one matplotlib call. That is, we'll render the bunny without using the 3D axis.

item.title: Matplotlib in Data Driven SEO
item.description: At Whites Agency we analyze big unstructured data to increases client's online visibility. We share our story of how we used Matplotlib to present the complicated data in a simple and reader-friendly way.
